original_title: Patti LaBelle: Live In New York
overview: No one artist packs more energy into a performance than soul queen Patti LaBelle.  Here captured on DVD are 100 minutes of pure Patti performing her biggest hits at New York's legendary Apollo Theater, where the intensity of her performance is matched only by the enthusiasm of the Theater's equally legendary crowds.  The DBD also features a guest appearance by Bid Daddy Kane as her latest hit, "Feels Like Another One." And all you have to do to experience this display of unparalleled soul power is take this DVD and slip it In.
title: Patti LaBelle: Live In New York
